A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought this movie was amazing\, so many things were unexpected and I loved that. All the performances were fantastic. This Star Wars movie is different from others\, and it made me think about the movie and the characters for weeks after I saw it and I wanted to keep going back to learn and understand more\, and thats what I think a great film does. This film makes me so excited for episode 9.
